title: What are the examples of preauth and completion transactions with credit card or prepaid card? - Quora

response.answer_text: A verification is done to ensure that the card is good and the credentials the cardholder entered were accurate. Using a verification is standard process for adding new users or for someone about to use a metered service. (Uber or Lyft for example checking to make sure the card is still good before they let you ride.) An authorization might be done for a couple reasons. The first would be to make sure the amount being charged is available, as well as having the benefits of a verification mentioned above. Another reason would be if you're shipping physical goods. A company may authorize the card and then not capture until the physical good ships. This helps reduce chargebacks and general concerns from cardholders.

Pre Auth transaction is authorizing your Card details in prior . Best example is the app Booking.Com . As soon as we book the Hotel on the app, It will ask for card details . It will just ask for card details but not Cut the money from the Card . If its not cutting the amount, then why details ? If you book the Hotel …and its confirmed. So, different hotels have different plans. You can cancel some hotels till the date of Entering for free. Then Not a problem .Some Hotels, You cannot cancel once booked . If you attempt to cancel, then the amount will be cut from the Card :) .Its a good method. But quite confusing . Cheers
